title: County Jail
description: Three college girls are each caught separately in the small Southern town for a minor traffic infraction, unaware of their dire circumstances until they are brought to the County Jail. The Sheriff, Judge, even the distinguished citizens all conspire to sexually enslave the girls, taking their young bodies in the most perverted manner. Each girl, different in her own way, try to cope with the circumstances of her capture and enslavement.You can buy the book herehttp://www.a1adultebooks.com/ebooks/b...
author: Powerone
